This is a multipart message in MIME format.

------=_NextPart_000_0063_01D07C1B.42EBDF60
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="us-ascii"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

The Strafford Town Office will be closed on Wednesday, April 22 so that we
may attend an all-day training. 

Be back open on Thursday normal hours.

 

Lisa M. Kendall

Town Clerk/Treasurer

Town of Strafford

P.O. Box 27, Strafford, VT 05072

802-765-4411  Fax 802-765-9621

e-mail:  <mailto:townclerk@straffordvt.org> townclerk@straffordvt.org

WEB: straffordvt.org

 

--------------------------- 
You received this message as a subscriber on the strafford@lists.valley.net discussion list.

When replying to a posting, if you receive the list digest, use the "Reply to sender" or "Reply to list" links at the end of the individual message. If you receive each posting as a separate email, use your mail program's Reply or Reply-To-All function, as appropriate. Please edit your reply to include only the relevant portions of the original posting, not the entire email.

All Upper Valley-wide posts should be sent ONLY to uppervalley@lists.valley.net.

Anyone can subscribe to this group by sending a blank message to
strafford-subscribe@lists.valley.net.
To be removed from this list, send a blank message to
strafford-unsubscribe@lists.valley.net.

For the list homepage with posting guidelines and instructions for changing your subscription options, visit http://lists.valley.net/lists/info/strafford. The archives with all previous messages posted to this list can be found at http://lists.valley.net/lists/arc/strafford.

This discussion list is provided at no cost by Vital Communities, a regional nonprofit organization based in White River Junction, Vermont, working to engage citizens, organizations, and communities in creating solutions to our region's challenges. To learn more, go to www.vitalcommunities.org.

	charset="us-ascii"
